data.actual_result: Sometimes you need to tap twice
data.expected_result: Should be tappable with one tap
data.short_description: Sometimes you aren't able to tap people in the voice channel with one tap [Might be in a certain area]
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - Open the voice channel drawer from the bottom - Start to tap yourself and try it repetitively - Observe how in certain areas you aren't able to tap on yourself with one tap
